vue_ui_xy.name: VueUiXy
vue_ui_xy.description: Classic evolution chart using lines, bars or plots.

userOptions.name: Full screen
userOptions.description: Displays the chart in full screen mode.

emits.name: selectLegend
emits.description: Emits the current visible series when selecting a legend item.

emits.name: selectX
emits.description: Emits the current visivle series at the selected x index when clicking on the chart.

slots.name: svg
slots.description: Use this slot to inject any svg element on the top layer of the chart.

slots.name: legend
slots.description: Use this slot to create a custom legend.

slots.name: tooltip-before
slots.description: Use this slot to inject content on the top area of the tooltip.

slots.name: tooltip-after
slots.description: Use this slot to inject content on the bottom area of the tooltip.

slots.name: reset-action
slots.description: Use this slot to customize the reset button of the zoom slider.
